ingredient module¶

class ingredient.Ingredient(name: str, desc: str)[source]¶

Bases: object

Represents one portion of ingredient. Contains the name and description of the given ingredient.

name¶

The name of the ingredient.

Type:

str

desc¶

A brief description of the ingredient

Type:

str

Example

The Ingredient class is contructed like so:

$ Ingredient("steak", "ideally ribeye")
property desc¶
property name¶

MealPlanner
